Name: Hashir Omer
AboutMe:
Some of the finest Einstein's quotes

If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough

Its a miracle that curiosity survives formal education

Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them

Logic will take you from A to B, imagination will take you everywhere

Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new

Gravitation is not possible for people falling in love

Heroism on command,senseless violence and all the loathsome nonsense that goes by the name of Patriotism-how passionately I hate them!

It was the experience of mystery mixed with fear that engendered religion

i have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.
